item.title: Court Wizard... Shurian Edition!
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
Hello people! The Shurian is here! Have you seen such a wonderful community coming together? Well, I wanna join in on the fun too!

So… it is our favourite class, to LUL at. The Court Wizard. Why do we struggle with him? Well, people don’t find it fun…

Court Wizard

Blue Dragon Support
Win Condition:
Arcane Mastery(Passive): Immune to Redirection. {YES}
Magic Barrier(Day): Make a player immune to negative effects besides kills. It will notify you if it blocked something. If it did not do anything, a charge is not used. Your barrier protected [name]! or Your barrier was not used. {3 uses}
Ice Ward(Night): Prevent Killers from visiting your target. Cannot be targeted on yourself. It will notify you if a Killer tried to visit. [A Killer was prevented from visiting your target!] [No Killer was detected.]_{3 uses}
Tornado(Night): Swap a player’s position with another’s, causing all actions on them to be targeted at each other. You swapped [NAME] and [NAMELESS] last night.{3 uses}

I wonder what will happen if we put all three worthless skills together… Ehehehehehe… Comment.

UPDATE 1: BARRIER IS NOT USED UNLESS SUCCESSFUL.

UPDATE 2: REDUCED ICE WARD CHARGE TO 3 FROM 5.

Read full topic
